message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, these costs would typically be categorized as "Selling Expenses" since they relate to the costs of securing orders and delivering goods to customers.

In the income statement provided, I can see:
```
| Selling Expenses | 8884.87 | 2024-02-01 |
```

This line item represents the costs associated with sales activities, including securing customer orders and delivering goods and services.

Therefore, the value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver the goods and services is 8884.87.

{"solution": {'value': '8884.87'}}
